text: The Aryan Brotherhood of Texas or (ABT) is an American white supremacist and Neo-Nazi prison and street gang founded in Texas in 1981. They are also known as the tip and ace deuce. They sometimes refer to themselves as "peckerwoods". They have spread into the prisons of neighboring states, in particular New Mexico. Tattoos include a shield with a sword, sometimes incorporating a swastika. Aryan Brotherhood is not connected with Aryan brotherhood of Texas. They are known for drug trafficking, extortion, and robbery. == References == * https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/extremist-files/group/aryan- brotherhood-texas Category:Gangs
title: Aryan Brotherhood of Texas
